def_cn: 不稳固的;不牢靠的;不会长久的;不会成功的
def_en: If you describe a situation as shaky, you mean that it is weak or unstable, and seems unlikely to last long or be successful.

def_cn: (声音或身体)颤抖的,发抖的
def_en: If your body or your voice is shaky, you cannot control it properly and it shakes, for example because you are ill or nervous.
